info.name: SIGEU API Documentation
info.description:
## üìÇ API Structure

### üß± **Core**

Contains the fundamental resources of the system: base tables that must be populated manually from the database.

---

### üë• **Users**

Manages user accounts and different system roles. Includes all operations related to authentication flow and profile management.

---

### üåê **External Organizations**

Administra el registro, validaci√≥n y gesti√≥n de las **organizaciones externas** que colaboran o participan en los eventos universitarios.

---

### üéì **Events**

Manages the registration, validation, and administration of external organizations that collaborate or participate in university events.

item.description: Module responsible for the complete management of events, from their creation to the association of resources and participants. It allows you to link organizers, facilities, and external organizations, controlling the traceability of each event.
